Description

Marbleous Blocks is point & click, physics based, 3D-puzzle game, where you combine tetromino shaped blocks to create paths for a marble named Max. Your goal is to guide Max through 45 puzzles, retrieve the missing energy orbs and restore the colors of the rainbow.

Create paths
Carefully position and rotate 3D-tetrominoes to create paths for Max. Creating paths requires energy cubes so you need to carefully plan the paths so you and Max do not run out of energy.

Switch suits
Max may wear different suits, each with its own set of abilities. Switch between different suits to gain access to different parts of a puzzle. Planning is key, but since you may undo your actions, exploration is encouraged.

Challenge your spatial thinking
If you are into puzzles that challenge your spatial thinking, like exploring different solutions and happen to have a soft spot for retro sound, this is probably a game for you.
